Classes in com.lab111.labwork5 that implement RecordFilter
 class ChainedAndRecordFilter
          Chained filter with 'AND' type condition: returns true only if all filters in the chain also returns true.
 class ChainedRecordFilter
          Abstract base class for chained filters.
 class FieldEqFilter
          Record filter that matches records having a given value in given column
 class FieldFilter
          Abstract base class for implementations comparing single field with specified value
